shrimp.name: FPulsetrain
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: val
output.description: Value of the wave at x

shrimp.usage: An antialiased version of the "pulsetrain" function, which generates a signal that repeats with a given period, and is 0 when 0 <=mod(x,period)<edge, and 1 when mod(x,period)>edge. The antialiased version takes into account that the filter may cover multiple pulses in the train.
